name: Hellbound: Survival Mode
description: 90's style First Person Shooter, 20 years later.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and later Processor: MD Phenom II X4-945 / Intel Core 2 Quad 6600 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R7 240 GB / Nvidia GT 730 2GB / Intel HD 530 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and later Processor: AMD FX-8320 / Intel i5-2400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 4GB / Nvidia GTX 770 4GB Storage: 4 GB available space
